The Power of Data for Governance in Africa

This report by the MO Ibrahim Foundation highlights the importance of data for governance in Africa, focusing on closing data gaps to accelerate transformation. It covers topics such as data demand, supply, and solutions, including international funding, National Statistical Offices, and local reporting.

Key Concepts:

  • Data demand
  • Data supply
  • CRVS system
  • Governance data
  • Development data
data governance Africa statistics monitoring
